data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernando Carbayo, Marta Álvarez-Presas, Cĺaudia T. Olivares, Fernando P. L. Marques, Eud Óxia M. Froehlich, Marta Riutort (2013): Molecular phylogeny of Geoplaninae (Platyhelminthes) challenges current classification: proposal of taxonomic actions. Zoologica Scripta 42: 508-528, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.399812
